Package entities.transaction

Interface ITransaction

All Known Implementing Classes:
BankServiceAccrualTransaction, DepositTransaction, InterestSaveTransaction, Transaction, TransferTransaction, WithdrawalTransaction
public interface ITransaction
Interface for transaction. (Performs the role of a command, caretaker, acceptor)
